## Classes Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/fixednumoperandtraits">FixedNumOperandTraits&lt;SubClass, ARITY&gt;</a></>}>
<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/fixednumoperandtraits">FixedNumOperandTraits</a> - determine the allocation regime of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> array when it is a prefix to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> object, and the number of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> objects is known at compile time. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/fixednumoperandtraits/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optionaloperandtraits">OptionalOperandTraits&lt;SubClass, ARITY&gt;</a></>}>
<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optionaloperandtraits">OptionalOperandTraits</a> - when the number of operands may change at runtime. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optionaloperandtraits/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/variadicoperandtraits">VariadicOperandTraits&lt;SubClass&gt;</a></>}>
<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/variadicoperandtraits">VariadicOperandTraits</a> - determine the allocation regime of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> array when it is a prefix to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> object, and the number of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> objects is only known at allocation time. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/variadicoperandtraits/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hungoffoperandtraits">HungoffOperandTraits</a></>}>
<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hungoffoperandtraits">HungoffOperandTraits</a> - determine the allocation regime of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> array when it is not a prefix to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> object, but allocated at an unrelated heap address. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hungoffoperandtraits/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

Macro for generating in-class operand accessor declarations.

It should only be called in the public section of the interface.

Definition at line <a href="#l00108">108</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/operandtraits-h">OperandTraits.h</a>.

<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// HungoffOperandTraits - determine the allocation regime of the Use array</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// when it is not a prefix to the User object, but allocated at an unrelated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// heap address.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This is the traits class that is needed when the Use array must be</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Macro for generating in-class operand accessor declarations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// It should only be called in the public section of the interface.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108" lineLink="#ae2107854846af9e74b6d0eea33ed040f"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define DECLARE&#95;TRANSPARENT&#95;OPERAND&#95;ACCESSORS(VALUECLASS) \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">  public: \\</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">  inline const&#95;op&#95;iterator op&#95;begin() const; \\</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">  protected: \\</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">  public: \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">  inline unsigned getNumOperands() const</span></CodeLine>
